MULTITRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trade cards and/or items with other players with a Trade Pass
IN_TRADE: {{user}} You have already sent a trade request to someone. Please cancel the previous request before starting a new one.
AUTHOR_IS_QUED: {{author}} You are quarantined. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#quarantined>) for detailed information about the quarantined status.
MEMBER_IS_QUED: {{author}} That user is quarantined. Visit our [Guide](<https://guide.sofi.gg/user-status#quarantined>) for detailed information about the quarantined status.
BUY_TP_1: {{user}} does not have an active **Trade Pass**
BUY_TP_2: Visit our website below to **Bump** and exchange your points for items, including the **Trade Pass**
FINISH_TRADE_WARN: {{author}} You need to complete the `{{commandName}}` command before you can continue
SENT_TRADE: Do you want to accept {{author}}'s trade request?
NOTE_EXAMPLE: Add context for a trade that might look suspicious

MULTITRADE_EXTRA_INFO: This command will send a trade request to another player you have selected if both players have an active Trade Pass. Once they accept the request, the embed will allow both players to submit multiple cards and items to trade. Once both sides have locked in their selection and agreed to the trade, the cards and/or items will be added to both collection or inventory respectively
